Overall it is a good survival multiplayer game where you try to escape as a survivor by fixing up generators or be the killer and feed the Entity(a unknown force that is fed by the killers sacrifices) by hooking survivors.

Fun with friends. Really horrible and toxic playing solo.  Que times for survivor are really long because less people are playing killer from bullying etc. If you are a horror fan, and you aren't bothered by tea-bagging or you have friends to play with then YES i recommend this game. If you can't handle the negative stuff stay FAR away.

A very very fun game, don't love the DC penalty just because my computer, the game, or the servers will go down and then I get a penalty for quitting when it wasn't my choice. I would really enjoy for the game to tell if it was a forced quit or one the player initiated but I dont know much about coding or if thats even possible. Anyways Highly highly recommend the game to others especially if you have friends who would be interested in playing.

Game good, albeit a bit laggy. Often has problems with it's online, be it the kinda whack matchmaking, or the spotty connection, but the gameplay, when it works, is super good. Highly recommended for Survival Horror fans, or Horror Fans in general.

You should definitely play this if you hate yourself and what to hate yourself more.
I myself, continue coming back even though it elevates my blood pressure so much that my doctor had to place me on medication for it. 9.5/10
Its a good game but theres lag spike issues that arent hardware related so it sometimes kills you.

People mistake this game for being real life, therefore they hide in lockers & heal all throughout the trial while you're the only one doing generators.. not to mention if the Killer tunnels and camps you, you will most likely de-rank for it.

On the Killer side of things, Survivors are way too OP when actually doing objectives and keeping chases.

This game is terribly imbalanced. The only good thing about it is it's fun with friends, which is the only reason I play it. 

0/10

Although I would recommend this game for new players since it is a fun game.

I don't consider myself an experienced player but killer queue times are ridiculous and survivor beyond a certain point isn't much better. It makes League of Legends queue times look nice by comparison.

Not gonna lie, I really enjoyed this game up until they added the new matchmaking.  2 out of every 3 matches are sweat fest where the killer just ends up face camping.  I really hope they change it cus this is not it chief.
